title: Arc Flash Clothing Kit: Size Large, Cotton, Jacket, Pants & Hoods
body_html:
Item #: 48587661
Brand: Chicago Protective Apparel
Model #: AG12-HJP-L-9

Product Specifications

Protection Type Arc Flash
Garment Type Jacket; Pants; Hoods
Maximum Arc Flash Protection (cal/Sq. cm) 12.00
Size Large
Glove Type Electrical Protection Gloves
Head or Face Protection Type Electrical Protection Hoods
Clothing Material Cotton
Clothing Color Navy
Gear Bag Included Yes
Number Of Pieces 12.000
Includes Arc Flash Hooded Jacket and Pant Kit - Size: Large 9 - CPA?s arc flash kits come complete with the garments, head and face protection, gloves and accessories an electrical worker needs to stay protected from arc flash hazards on the job. The 12 Cal Hood Jacket and Pant Kit comes with navy 12 cal hooded jacket and pants made from arc and flame-resistant UltraSoft, a fabric blend made from 88% cotton and 12% nylon. The jacket has all Velcro closures and knit wristlets, and pants feature front Velcro closure, belt loops, and leg slits with continuous Velcro closures. Garments are AR / FR, and loose fitting to allow for air pockets that provide extra protection. The kit also includes a hard cap, face shield with chin cup, cap bracket, knit Nomex hood, 11" Class "0" rubber insulating gloves, leather protector gloves, safety glasses, ear plugs, glove bag, and gear bag.
UNSPSC Code 46181500
